ch0044_40_tsutsuji/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s enjoy the lively night—but make sure to
study, too!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7101_0701_01_10:
There’s an ancient painted image on
Runerigus’s body.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7101_0701_02_10:
And apparently, horrific memories are associated
with that image...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7101_0701_03_10:
What’s carved into stone doesn’t disappear
easily, so the message within the image engraved
on Runerigus must be important.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7102_0701_01_10:
The point of wearing a costume is to look like
someone else...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7102_0701_02_10: Hehehe! I’m the witch of stone!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7102_0701_03_10: I’ll turn you to stone and add you to my collection!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7103_0701_01_10:
At the Rustboro Gym, we have minerals and fossils
on display, just like a museum.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7103_0701_02_10: Of course, collecting stones is my hobby, but...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7103_0701_03_10:
I want the students of the Trainers’ School to learn
something there, too.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7104_0701_01_10:
When you actually take to time to examine things
and feel them with your own hands, you can learn
more about them.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7104_0701_02_10:
And places like museums give you that
opportunity. That’s why we must cherish them.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ll be meeting my rock pals soon to talk about the
rare stones we’ve found.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7105_0701_02_10:
Would you like to join us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/7105_0701_03_10: Steven’s theories about stones are interesting!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/1701_0701_01_10:
A rolling Geodude gathers no moss. Life is all
about learning.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/1701_0701_02_10: And that’s why I have a gift for you!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/1701_0702_01_10: If you don’t know how to use it, just ask!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0701_01_10:
Stones have the potential to last forever, so they
can contain all kinds of thoughts.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0701_02_10:
A stone can get passed on to different people and
Pokémon, all of their feelings accumulating...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0701_03_10:
So even an ordinary-looking stone can carry a
stupendous story!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0702_01_10: A stone can store both good thoughts and bad.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ve been told voices can be heard from stones
that store a ghost Pokémon’s grudge...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2501_0702_03_10:
Ehehe! Even stones with a peculiar charm can be
mesmerizing!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2511_0701_01_10:
Pewter Crunchies—a Pewter City specialty—are a
snack that look just like stones!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2511_0701_02_10:
They have a light soy sauce flavor, making them
perfect with tea!
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2511_0702_01_10:
But Pewter Crunchies can be as hard as Brock’s
Geodude, so...
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/2511_0702_02_10:
If you don’t have the jaw of a Tyrantrum, you
won’t be able to eat much.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I got too worked up yesterday. How silly
of me.
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you finished preparing for the festival?
Everyone is wearing such extraordinary costumes,
don’t you think?
ch0044_40_tsutsuji/3005_0701_01_10:
Let’s enjoy ourselves tonight! Though we shouldn’t
stay up too late, OK?
